meanings.definition: Of or relating to true bugs of the order Heteroptera.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the heteropterous insects in great detail.
meanings.sent2: The heteropterous bugs have distinct features that set them apart.
meanings.sent3: The heteropterous bugs threw a tiny party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The heteropterous world is a mysterious realm waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the colorful heteropterous creatures.

meanings.definition: A true bug of the order Heteroptera.
meanings.sent1: The heteropterous crawled slowly across the leaf.
meanings.sent2: I found a heteropterous in the garden today.
meanings.sent3: The heteropterous decided to take a nap on the flower petal.
meanings.sent4: The heteropterous was a tiny explorer in the vast garden.
meanings.sent5: The heteropterous chirped softly in the moonlit night.
